nodes.text: Speaking about oneself is not vulgar neither offensive in this case
Speaking of oneself in this occasion is a means not an end

While I am well aware Athenians that to talk in this assembly about oneself and one s own speeches is a very profitable practice if one has the necessary effrontery I feel it is so vulgar and so offensive that though I see the necessity I shrink from it.
I believe however that you will form a better judgement of what I am going to propose if I remind you of a few things that I have said on former occasions
